title: Hello World
text:
Welcome to my new blog! Unfortunately, my prior website isn’t working anymore, and my backup got eaten by spilled coffee. So here’s to new adventures and a new blog! I might also repost some older post for which I can find backups.
The picture was taken in 2024 after I interviewed for my current position in Zurich. View is from the main university tower.

title: Tobias Dienlin
text:
Welcome!

My name is Tobias Dienlin. I’m a professor for Media Psychology and Methods at the Department of Communication, University of Zurich.
My research interests include media effects, well-being, privacy, and open science.
On this website, you can find a blog where I occasionally write about research and current findings. You can also find the current version of my CV.
Please always feel free to reach out! You can find me on Bluesky, Google Scholar, ORCID, GitHub, or send me an email
